sentences.en: "Rid Of Me" is harrowing, uneasy listening.
sentences.cn: 《弃我而去》这首歌非常伤感，听起来很晦涩。

sentences.en: a promise to rid the country of nuclear weapons
sentences.cn: 销毁本国核武器的承诺

sentences.en: Cities upstream use the river to get rid of sewage.
sentences.cn: 上游的城市将污水排放到河里。

sentences.en: Everybody still jumps up and down about being rid of tyrants.
sentences.cn: 大家都还在为摆脱了暴君的统治而激动不已。

sentences.en: Getting rid of him will be a piece of cake.
sentences.cn: 摆脱掉他就是小事一桩。

sentences.en: Getting rid of rubbish can cost $100 a ton.
sentences.cn: 清除垃圾每吨要花费100美元。

sentences.en: He has gone, and I'm glad to be rid of him.
sentences.cn: 他走了, 而我很高兴摆脱了他.

sentences.en: He latched onto us and we couldn't get rid of him.
sentences.cn: 他缠着我们,甩也甩不掉.

sentences.en: How to get rid of these things is a big problem.
sentences.cn: 如何清除这些东西是个大问题.

sentences.en: It fell to me to get rid of them.
The proposals are an attempt to rid the country of political corruption.
sentences.cn: 这些提议是使该国摆脱政治腐败的一种尝试。

sentences.en: There is a manual pump to get rid of the water.
sentences.cn: 有一只手摇水泵用来排水。

sentences.en: Why couldn't he ever rid himself of those thoughts, those worries?
sentences.cn: 为什么他总是无法摆脱那些想法和担忧？

sentences.en: You can usually get rid of hiccoughs by drinking water very quickly.
sentences.cn: 你可以用快速喝水法消除打嗝.

sentences.en: You can't simply wave a wand and get rid of nuclear weapons.
sentences.cn: 你们不要以为魔杖一挥便能消除核武器。

sentences.en: You seem in rather a hurry to get rid of me.
sentences.cn: 看起来你急于想摆脱我。

sentences.en: You'll never quite get rid of every last bit of grit.
sentences.cn: 无法把所有的沙砾都清除干净。

phrases.tran_cn: 摆脱，除掉（讨厌的事物或人而）情况转好
除掉，摆脱（讨厌的事物或人）

trans.tran_en: If you rid a place or person of something undesirable or unwanted, you succeed in removing it completely from that place or person

trans.tran_cn: 使摆脱， 解除…的负担， 从…中清除
trans.tran_en: If you rid a place or person of something undesirable or unwanted, you succeed in removing it completely from that place or person
